title: Circular motion - period of conical pendulum

content.description: An object with mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is connected to a string that is attached to a ceiling. The object completes a circular path of radius <math alttext="r" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> parallel to the ceiling, as shown, in time <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>.
